extendedInfo.description: A computer plays rock-paper-scissors on behalf of youThe most popular game!"Rock, paper, scissors"I made the rock, paper, scissors application.* ** How to use ***When I start application and tap a screen.Stone scissors par changes in random.A screen stops when I tap it once again.The hand to show is left to luck!This game is won or lost?* ** Operation check model ***HTC Desire SoftBank X06HT2
